nml_option.name: config_AM_freshwaterThickness_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member freshwater thickness is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_freshwaterThickness_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_freshwaterThickness_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the freshwaterThickness analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_freshwaterThickness_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_freshwaterThickness_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: freshwaterThicknessAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the template analysis member.

var.name: riverTagTracer1FwThickness
var.description: Integrated riverTagTracer1 from surface to bottom

var.name: riverTagTracer2FwThickness
var.description: Integrated riverTagTracer2 from surface to bottom
